contentList.content: Châtiment occulte : Sélecteur
Vous donne le choix entre avoir Châtiment occulte actif sur tous les coups ou uniquement pour les coups critiques. Utilisez à nouveau la capacité pour la désactiver.
Châtiment occulte : Actif
Châtiment occulte : Actif sur coups critiques
Sélectionné : Cette capacité sera utilisée sur toutes les attaques réussies qui ne tueront pas la cible.
Sélectionné : Cette capacité sera utilisée sur tous les coups critiques réussis qui ne tueront pas la cible.

On your next hit with your Pact Weapon that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an extra [1] to the target, and the creature will be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> if it is Huge or smaller.

On your next <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with your Pact Weapon that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an extra [1] to the target, and the creature will be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> if it is Huge or smaller.
Dispater Smite : Actif
Dispater Smite : Actif sur coups critiques

On your next hit with the Mace of Dispater that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and the creature will be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> if it is Huge or smaller.

On your next <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with the Mace of Dispater that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and the creature will be knocked <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag> if it is Huge or smaller.
Acamar Smite : Actif
Acamar Smite : Actif sur coups critiques

On your next hit with the Claw of Acamar that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and the creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> will be reduced to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.

On your next <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with the Claw of Acamar that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and the creature's <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> will be reduced to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.
Moonbow Smite : Actif
Moonbow Smite : Actif sur coups critiques

On your next hit with the Moonbow that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Spell Slot to deal an additional [1] to the target. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against Lycanthropes with the bow.

On your next <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with the Moonbow that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Spell Slot to deal an additional [1] to the target. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against Lycanthropes with the bow.
Curse Bringer Smite : Actif
Curse Bringer Smite : Actif sur coups critiques

On your next hit with the Curse Bringer that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and you can reduce the creature’s <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.

On your next <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with the Curse Bringer that is not a Killing Blow you will expend a Warlock Spell slot to deal an additional [1] to the target, and you can reduce the creature’s <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> to 0 feet until the end of your next turn.
Immobile
The creature has its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> reduced to 0 and cannot move.
